Ae ansan hrgh cze vatnạviy Allah tʿālyā kanhh tklyfah kanhh blayah kanhh bymạryah kunh tngyah ps chuhnh kanhh akhah yus tth tklyfs cze nishhi tth tklyfs dvur hykhi krith ts mʿbvdi brḥqs vrạe, hrgah suh vatnạviy cze kanhh khạrah ṣḥtah dvlthah, tsnd athh kanhh rttith hykhi nh, suh chuh prth chyzs petth qdrt vvl.

Tim lvukh yimn ashi ktab ʿṭa kr tim chhi amis pyghbri brḥqs shk vshubh vrạe tithe pạtthụ̄ zanan th przh navan goddh petthe yithh pạtthụ̄ pnnyn nychvyn zanan th prznavan chhi, yimv lvukv bavjvdi shhadt kubry yʿny bddgvạhy āsnkhi bavjvd pnun pan tavans th nqṣans mnz trạvụ̄ tim ḥẓ pczh krn nh, nh tvḥyds nh rsalts.
